Kalamazoo.Heritage Guitars:
Heritage Guitar is a guitar manufacturer in Kalamazoo, Michigan, United States.


== History ==
Heritage Guitar was founded in 1985 by former employees of the Gibson guitar factory, including Jim Deurloo, Marv Lamb, JP Moats, Bill Paige, and Mike Korpak. In the early 1980s, Gibson, faced with excess production capacity, closed its historic Parsons Street factory in Kalamazoo, Michigan and relocated much of its production to its factory in Nashville, Tennessee.
